name: subunit
description: D3 Selections in THREE.js, D3 Syntax in WebGL

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -o dist/d3-selection.js -- index.js
scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup -f umd -c --watch

author: Steve Hall <shall@delimited.io> (http://delimited.io/)
